name: area51-telegram-bot
description: Area51 - Telegram Trading Bot for Monad Testnet

scripts.backup:manual: node -e "const BackupSystem = require('./scripts/backup-system'); const bs = new BackupSystem(); bs.initialize().then(() => bs.performFullBackup()).then(id => console.log('Backup completed:', id)).catch(console.error);"
scripts.backup:list: node -e "const BackupSystem = require('./scripts/backup-system'); const bs = new BackupSystem(); bs.listBackups().then(backups => console.log(JSON.stringify(backups, null, 2))).catch(console.error);"
scripts.backup:status: node -e "const BackupSystem = require('./scripts/backup-system'); const bs = new BackupSystem(); bs.getStatus().then(status => console.log(JSON.stringify(status, null, 2))).catch(console.error);"
scripts.monitoring:restart: npm run monitoring:stop && npm run monitoring:start
